        public java.lang.String[] getFileNames(java.lang.String pathToParentFolder)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Return filenames from the given relative path
        Parameters:
        pathToParentFolder - either "."/"" or "foo/bar.." (replacing ".." with the rest of the path)
        Returns:
        an array of filenames contained in the folder with path equal to path argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if path is invalid or filetree not initialized

      • setCompressionType

        public void setCompressionType(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String Type)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the compression type for the file in the given path
        Parameters:
        path - relative path to a file
        Type - the compression type, either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the file does not exist, or the compression type does not support the file or if changing the compression of an already compressed file, or the compression type does not exist

                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the default compression parameter for the given compression type
        Parameters:
        type - either "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"
        Returns:
        the default parameter for the type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if compressionType is not "LZW", "LZ78", "LZSS" or "JPEG"

                             throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        Path - relative path to the file
        Returns:
        String that contains the entire document in UTF-8
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if i/o error, or the decompression fails

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
